name: ABILITY FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Objective or Vision RenderingContinuous and Qualitative Financial Services to the poor women to improvetheir Quality of life through social transformation activities and integrating thecommunities to create unity and courageTo open branches within area of operation of thesocietyTo establish, to support or to aid in establishment and support of association, institution, funds, trust etc.,constitute for the benefit of the membersTo prepare finance schemes for amelioration ofthe financial condition of member, to prepare projects on behalf of its membersfor financial and technical assistance from other organizations and to chargeservice charges for services rendered.To enter into participation arrangement(s) withany other Banks or financial institutions with the object of making loans andadvancesThrift and Credit programs and Educating andTraining Rural Women beneficiaries in their interested areas of workTo do all such other things as are incidentaland conducive to the promotion or advancement of these objects.Conducting Staff Development programs for thebenefit of EmployeesProvision of Technical Education, VocationalTraining and Development for the Society members and for their SustainableLivelihood
